apa unwahansege wachanaya adhyayanaya kara eyata kikaru wemin saha unwahansewa soyana kala yoshuwage yachnyawa karanakotagena chandrayawa nawatha lu ema dewiyan wahansema (yoshuwa 10:12â€“13) apatada elesama aaradhana karanu labanne karunawe sinhasanaya wetha editharawa pamina pahadimakin yukthawa yachnya kirimataya, manda unwahansege dayawa saha karunawa pathuruwa lamin apage awashyayathawayedi apata upakara karanu pinisaya (hebraw 4:16).

midula kerawale wathusudda watata eha paththe pare aduru hewanali dekak wage pa une ara gatayayi gatissiyi wenta..mayi sudu hamineth ohoma guli gahila giyapu kalayak thibba.wasitiye kahapata mal pirichcha mara gaha yata gal bankuwe guli gahila api kochchara nam dewal katha karada.rasige awuwa sudu haminege kammul wala pata thawarapu hati balana idilla nam mata kisi dawasaka athi une na.wasitiyen awut wela tika kalekinma mata ha pura kiyala kolambaa kanthoruwaka rassawak labuna.udarata walawuwaka ekama ganu daruwa wechcha sudu haminewa ammek appek nathi anatha kollekta denna sudu haminelage appachchila manapa une na.dawasak da maligawa wadinta aapu welawaka mage athe ellila punchi kellek wage kolambaa aapu sudu hamine edayin passe aapahu walawuwata giye na.api kachcheriyata gohilla kasade rejistar keruwa.wasitiye apiwa hich karapu thissayayi padmayayima kasadedith ape sakki karayo una..mala, hawadi, kuru ,nodama sudu sela nadama sudu hamine sinnakkarama mage una.eda idan mata unnu ekama naya sudu hamine thamayi.

shishyathwa pradanothsawaya wenuwen uthuru mada palath aandukara karunarathna diwulgane, adhyapana amathi bandula gunawardhana, uthuru mada pradhana amathya barti premalal disanayaka, parlimenthu manthri janaka priyantha bandara, anuradhapura maha disapathi ech.em.ke. herath, kalaniya wishwawidyalaye upa kulapathi mahacharya sarath amunugama, samastha lanka bauddha sammelanaye sabhapathi jagath sumathipala, madhyawedi hasantha hettiaarachchi gayana shilpi kithsiri jayasekara, shri lanka guwan hamudawe jyeshta niladharin wana gamini gunathilaka, chamika rupasinha, shri lanka eyar layin hi channa wirasinha, anura bandusena da silwa rajya ha paudgalika aayathana niyojanaya karamin adhyakshakawarun, kalamanakaruwan wana el.em.ke.thilakarathna am.bi.asawud, chandralal liyanage nandasiri wasalathilaka ee.aberathna sudath thennakon, samantha karunarathna yana mahathwaru athulu wishala pirisak sahabhagi wanu atha.
